```{r}

```

```{r}
summarise(group_by(as_tibble(tas_east), Purpose), media=mean(Trips))
```

```{r}
autoplot(tas_east) + 
facet_wrap(vars(Purpose), scale = "free_y") +
theme(legend.position = "none")
```
